channel.title: CVE Feed for Xylus Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xylus Themes -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32597|2024-04-18T08:27:37.842Z -- Xylus Themes -- WordPress Importer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xylus Themes WordPress Importer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Importer: from n/a through 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30201|2024-03-27T06:13:32.689Z -- Xylus Themes -- WordPress Importer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xylus Themes WordPress Importer allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WordPress Importer: from n/a through 1.0.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-31371|2024-04-12T09:28:51.534Z -- Xylus Themes -- WP Event Aggregator
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Xylus Themes WP Event Aggregator.This issue affects WP Event Aggregator: from n/a through 1.7.6.
